name: carlo-career-mcp
description: Access Carlo's career documents, answer questions, and search jobs in Zurich
long_description: This extension provides access to Carlo's career PDF documents, intelligent Q&A capabilities, and live job search in Zurich using the Adzuna API. It demonstrates Node.js-based MCP Bundle development with file operations and API integration.

tools.name: list_pdfs
tools.description: List all PDF files in the career documents directory

tools.name: read_pdf
tools.description: Read and extract text from a specific PDF file

tools.name: get_pdf_metadata
tools.description: Get metadata about a PDF file (page count, author, etc.)

tools.name: answer_career_question
tools.description: Answer questions about career documents using AI search

tools.name: search_zurich_jobs
tools.description: Search for jobs in Zurich using Adzuna API
